abstract: William A. Ackman, who has been embroiled in controversy with Herbalife and J.C. Penney, focused on his investment in Procter & Gamble on Wednesday.
snippet: William A. Ackman, who has been embroiled in controversy with Herbalife and J.C. Penney, focused on his investment in Procter & Gamble on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: For a hedge fund manager who has had his share of drama in recent months, William A. Ackman was notably subdued in a presentation on Wednesday.

headline.main: For Ackman, a Day Without Drama
